traceability.evidence: The implementation in src/config-loader.js and src/cli-options.js fully covers the acceptance criteria: it reads .dry-aged-deps.json (or custom file via --config-file), validates keys and value ranges, merges config with CLI flags (CLI > config > defaults), and exits with code 2 on invalid config or missing file. test/cli.config-file.test.js contains comprehensive integration tests (defaults from config, flag overrides, invalid JSON, unknown keys, out-of-range values, custom file path, missing file) that all pass as part of the existing 211-test Vitest suite.
traceability.notes: All specified acceptance criteria for Configuration File Support are met. Docs (README.md) describe the feature correctly, code has proper @story/@req traceability, and tests verify correct behavior and error handling.
